title: Jon Tuttle from Codeseven
itunes:title: Jon Tuttle from Codeseven
description:
What an episode and what a band! Jon Tuttle from Codeseven continues our march down North Carolina's storied punk/hardcore past with a very interesting discussion on how they almost signed with Earache Records, being a "bands band" and how he played in a band with not one, but both of his brothers. Do yourself a favor and dive into this episode, you won't be bummed. PC100WORDS is the code for 15% off your order via our pals at Rockabilia. All officially licensed and the highest quality band merch you can shake a stick at. Bridge Nine Records is proud to present Spiral Heads. A killer 7" from members of MGMT, Doomriders and American Nightmare. It's like an early 80's SST band. Check it out. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
